name: zeev jump to content
author: roycegracie

sections.description:
This plugin adds an accessible “jump to content” bar, Shawn only when pressing on the TAB key.
With this special bar, you will be able to allow disable people to “jump” to different content areas and pages, totally controlled by the admin panel.
This is plugin will assist you to farther accessible your website and make it easier for people with disabilities to find themselves in your site.

  • also, it doesn’t add nothing to the DataBase or adds an external script – so it will not slow your site.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. more options to the admin panel for better flexibility
  2. translation PO&MO files

Here’s a link to WordPress and one to Markdown’s Syntax Documentation.
Titles are optional, naturally.

Markdown uses email style notation for blockquotes and I’ve been told:

Asterisks for emphasis. Double it up for strong.

<?php code(); // goes in backticks ?>
sections.installation:
1. Upload zeevmobile folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. now you will see a button in your admin panel :”jump to content” where you can define the where the user will be jumped to.
  4. that is it ! you can access your site, press TAB, and see the bar on the top of the screen.
sections.faq:
can i change the buttons text ?

well, not from the admin panel. but it’s only 1 file, you can change things directly from the file.
although you should know that this bar is a black background on a white because this are accessible colors.

can i add more buttons ?

not at this version,
but if you need more, you can ask me on the support page and i will help
